ygData.subject: Re: Sole Survivor
ygData.msgSnippet: Across the baren wasteland that the IGL Obylisk had created, a creature not of this planet, punished the ground with migthy hooves. Then a shrieking laugh

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Across the baren wasteland that the IGL Obylisk had created, a creature
not of this planet, punished the ground with migthy hooves. Then a
shrieking laugh echoed across it. 

"Ohhhhhh that felt good." Screeched a robot on the back of the strange
beast. "You were really something in battle there brother." its hideous
voice spouted. It sounded like a mix between a talking raspy voice, and
a group of howling scavaging dogs. Upon a dark steed, sat a twisted
robot, shaking with each mighty hoove step. "That Autobots will surely
regret coming to this planet." 

As he finished his sentence, the hooves kept trudging, but began to miss
the ground, as giant wings extended from the dark stallion, begining to
lift it off the ground. Then in a very quiet, and whispering voice, the
beast responded. 

"The D.E.D ship, has disapeared. We are stranded." the deep dirge like
voice bit into the rider. 

"No." it hissed. "We will surely perish unless we find a source of
energon, or repair chamber. We will need to raise and atta..." he was
cut off by a deep unearthly noise that came from the stallion. 

He began to gracefully arc in a circle. "I detect energy, from a alien
creature, in this direction." he whispered, as he headed towards the
energy being used for translation.
